Vigilance Vineyards & Winery.address: 13888 Point Lakeview Road , Lower Lake , CA 95457
reviewComments: They have good wine and seating out side with a great view of the lake. If you call ahead the some times also have excellent lamb for sale. Take a coller to transport it home.

Shannon Ridge Winery.address: 13888 Pt. Lakeview Road , Vigilance Vineyard , Lower Lake , CA 95457
reviewComments: The wine was remarkably good and our service was Excellent! Kim catered to us teaching us all about the wine while we laughed and sipped all the varietals. A memorable afternoon... read more
Beautiful vineyard setting. The Owner Greg and wife Maryann are very friendly. All wines are superb.
